thread.section_title: Soundstore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Soundstore | www.soundstore.ie
thread.title: K M

author: K M
title: K M
text:
The price was great and the service was excellent. I ordered a printer on Monday and it was delivered for free on Wednesday.
My only issue is that Soundstore seem to be the strong, silent type - there were no emails about the completion or dispatch of my order. It arrived so quickly that it's not a major issue but those emails are nice to get just to know that your order is progressing as it should.
